name: PhotoSuite Slide Show File
summary: Learn about .PZS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MGI PhotoSuite was purchased by Roxio and became Roxio PhotoShow. PhotoSuite, which is now included with Roxio Creator, can open PZS files.
NOTE: .PZP files are project files that can create PZS files.

description: Slide Show created by PhotoSuite, an image editor and organizer; contains slide images assembled by the user that appear based on the user-customized settings.
